name: 3DMazePrototype
description:
This is a 3D maze game prototype made in unity. Main goal is to get the ball across the map from one corner to the other while avoiding obstacles. There is no win or lose condition its just a matter of getting from point a to point b with as few objects turning red as possible. 

Controls: 

  • WASD or Arrows
  • ESC exits the windows version.

Code can be found Here :)
